founder.name: Mr. Berhe Assefa
founder.description: Gelila Manufacturing PLC is founded and led by Mr. Berhe Assefa, an entrepreneur with decades of experience in manufacturing and industrial operations. His vision continues to guide the company's growth and diversification.

vision.title: Vision
statements: To become a leading manufacturing and service providing company in Ethiopia.

mission.title: Mission
statements: To produce competitive, high-quality products in footwear, food, and textiles for domestic and export markets.
To provide safe and reliable public transport services.
Delivering quality products and services that uplift lives, empower communities, and protect the environment.

coreValues.title: Integrity
coreValues.description: We operate with honesty and professionalism.

coreValues.title: Quality
coreValues.description: We maintain strict quality standards in products and services.

coreValues.title: Innovation
coreValues.description: We adopt modern technologies for continuous improvement.

coreValues.title: Teamwork
coreValues.description: We believe in collaborative growth with our employees and partners.
